channel.title: Embedded on Tarek Dief | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Embedded on Tarek Dief | Portfolio

item.title: REMOTE HEALTH MONITORING
item.description: The objective of this project is to develop user-friendly, wearable sensor technology for remote health monitoring of patients with neurological conditions to minimize their hospital visits and reduce the risk of COVID-19 spread.

item.title: X-06 airplane, PDAS.
item.description: The company is developing a reusable launch vehicle as a tourism spaceship with combustion mode switch engine (patent in 2012) have both modes propulsion.

item.title: Kite power system.
item.description: The aim of kite power system is to demonstrate a new technology to harvest wind energy with substantially lower material and environmental footprints with higher capacity factor than conventional wind turbines.

item.title: Quad-rotor
item.description: Quad-rotor is one of the most famous drones, it is a VTOL (Vertical Take-Off and Landing) aircraft which could be used in many applications like military surveillance, agriculture services which require high level of safety with low cost.

item.title: CanSat project
item.description: Project Details An Educational Nanosatellite microcontroller project utilizing various sensors, actuators, transmitters, and receivers.
